review: I have 2 fire tv's and am spoiled along with my wife. Switching back and forth from Prime TV to Netflix is flawless, meaning, you will be impressed with the speed at which this unit operates given a adequate internet service speed. My service is 80mg download speed which checks out in the high 70's under speeedtest.net and am using amazon prime. The only aggravation that we were presented with was a reset, that was required  to re-established service in order to fix a malfunction, but just like the intro video explains quite well, most glitches can be fixed with a power down for 30 seconds. The complete reset is in the settings menu and requires password for router and amazon to be reentered, but once done all the gremlins were gone! Audio search in the amazon offerings from the remote is cool and fast! If you have a 5.1 or higher setup, you will appreciate the quality sound from this unit given any good A/V amp and speaker usage.
